About Work

About

Education

I graduated in 2014 with a Bachelor's in Information Technology from Penn State University. My studies focused on web and mobile development with a minor in design. Frustrated in a lot websites being functional but not aesthetically pleasing, web development was a perfect way for me to visualize better interfaces and see it come to life through coding.

Current

I have a passion for learning and a curiosity for exploring new boundaries, and this keeps me updated on current web technologies. I pick things up quickly, know how to take criticism, and respond well to feedback all while performing in a demanding, fast-paced environment.

When I'm not coding, you can find me traveling, dabbling in photography, collaborating with other creative minds, hanging out at coffee shops, eating nachos or biking.

This site was built using SASS, jQuery and Liquid, generated with Jekyll.
